pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao

Class BookDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao.BookDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BookDAO

    @Repository
public class BookDAOImpl
extends Object
implements BookDAO
    Repository class for performing database operations on Message objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Detail

      • getListOfBooks

        public List<Book> getListOfBooks(String hql,
                                 int startResult)
        Description copied from interface: BookDAO
        Returns the list of the Book objects for given HQL and startResult. Returns all books if HQL is null or blank. The startResult specifies the range of the results.
        Specified by:
        getListOfBooks in interface BookDAO
        Parameters:
        hql - The String containing the HQL Statement
        startResult - The int containing the value that specifies the range of the results.
        Returns:
        A List<Book> representing the list of the Book objects.
